attributes.action: Reject any proposals to ban or restrict the use of older cars
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Several EU proposals across the years are dangerous to the classic car movement. One that has been under consideration is to ban the use of cars older than 10 years.  Similarly, Edinburgh City Council is considering the banning of cars over 15 years old from the town centre.
These, and similar, proposals directly threaten the classic car movement, and encourage the manufacture of new cars, with the attendent environmental issues of sourcing raw materials, manufacturing, distriuting and scrapping the spiralling supply of new vehicles.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to " Reject any proposals to ban or restrict the use of older cars."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15326.asp

Prime Minister's Office
